feed.title: BORIS - Behavioral Observation Research Interactive Software
feed.subtitle: BORIS news!

entry.title: v. 6.3.5 is available
entry.content: The v. 6.3.5 is available. A bug in 'Cancel modifier' function was fixed.
entry.summary: The v. 6.3.5 is available. A bug in 'Cancel modifier' function was fixed.

entry.title: v. 6.3.4 is available
entry.content: The v. 6.3.4 is available. A bug was found in the 'Stop ongoing state events between successive media files' function. Please do not use it for now. This function was disabled from the v. 6.3.4
entry.summary: The v. 6.3.4 is available. A bug was found in the 'Stop ongoing state events between successive media files' function. Please do not use it for now. This function was disabled from the v. 6.3.4

entry.title: A pre-release of v. 7 is available
entry.content: A pre-release of v. 7 is available at https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/releases/tag/v7.0.4. This version introduces various new features like the possibility to visualize up to 8 media simultaneously. Read carefully the notes and please test it and report any bug, comment or suggestion.. .
entry.summary: A pre-release of v. 7 is available at https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/releases/tag/v7.0.4. This version introduces various new features like the possibility to visualize up to 8 media simultaneously. Read carefully the notes and please test it and report any bug, comment or suggestion.

entry.title: v. 6.3.3 is available
entry.content: The v. 6.3.3 is available. A bug in the 'export aggregated events' function (format SDID) was fixed.

entry.title: v. 6.3.2 is available
entry.content: The v. 6.3.2 is available. A bug in export function (format xlsx) was fixed. The openpyxl module was downgraded to v. 2.4.9 for compatibility with the tablib module
